top_comments.comment: we need that retroid pocket 2+ mang! i wanna see what this so called 845 snapdragon Unisoc Quad-core Tiger T310 can do!

I was excited about this, but the Bad controls just killed My excitemend. I still hace My og Gpd XD, an rg350m for low end emus and an old pixel 1 on a gamepad for PSP and dreamcast. This was the device to take them all. O well

I bought a razer phone 2 a while ago for this purpose when it was half-off, I haven't really used that much as an emulation device, but it's there if I want it and at 90Hz refresh rate, SD845 4/6GB of RAM and those AMAZING front firing PROPER speakers, I think I'll stick with that. OTHER than that, I'll wait another year until I buy into these consoles, then they should be where I want them to be. Get a good 870 chip in them and a 720 screen should be a nice pairing.

I bought a razer phone 2 a while ago for this purpose when it was half-off, I haven't really used that much as an emulation device, but it's there if I want it and at 90Hz refresh rate, SD845 4/6GB of RAM and those AMAZING front firing PROPER speakers, I think I'll stick with that. OTHER than that, I'll wait another year until I buy into these consoles, then they should be where I want them to be. Get a good 870 chip in them and a 720 screen should be a nice pairing.
